720106f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Suffolk Street
720106f-a.text:
384 Grand Street, (rear house) west of the N.W. corner of Suffolk
Street. The view shows an alley extrance to a 4-story rear house.
July 1, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720106f-a.folder: Grand Street & Suffolk Street, Manhattan, NY

720107f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Suffolk Street
720107f-a.text:
Grand Street (foreground) at the N.E. corner of Suffolk
Street (left), showinog a store temporarily occupied for the
sale of Matzohs prior to the Passover holidays. This location
is miven bv the photographer and cannot be eerified by the
writer. If it is as claimed it will be No. 399O Grand Street
at vhich Brorlevs Atlas of 1922 reports a Bank to be located.
(Subsequently verified by personal observation, though slightly
altered.0)  March 26, 1937.
P.L. Snerr
NO RFPRODUCTIONS
